Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: In today's news people are pushing for a boost to JobSeeker payments in Australia. With a federal budget just around the corner everyone is waiting to see if the government steps up and helps struggling families experiencing financial stress. Meanwhile the Reserve Bank of New Zealand is under scrutiny as experts argue over whether they've done enough to address the country's economic problems. The Australian share market closed lower after investors were left feeling uncertain about the future. Finally a rescue operation was carried out to save 11 stranded fisherman off WA's coast.
